original_text: Lest I strip her naked, and set her as in the day that she was born, and make her as a wilderness, and set her like a dry land, and slay her with thirst.
korean_text: 그렇지 아니하면 내가 그를 벌거벗겨서 그 나던 날과 같게 할 것이요 그로 광야 같이 되게 하며 마른 땅 같이 되게 하여 목말라 죽게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and set her as in the day that she was born
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀를 태어난 날과 같이 설정하지 않도록

sentences.original_text: and make her as a wilderness
and set her like a dry land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀를 마른 땅처럼 설정하지 않도록
